text: Yesli vy, [o neveruyushchiye,] prosili vynesti resheniye [o tom, kakaya storona prava], to resheniye uzhe prishlo k vam. Yesli vy otvergnete neveriye, eto budet luchshe dlya vas. Yesli zhe vy vnov' obratites' [k vrazhde s Mukhammedom], to i My obratimsya k vam, i vam nichut' ne pomozhet dazhe mnogochislennost' vashego otryada. I, voistinu, Allakh - na storone veruyushchikh
